text: Sir Colville Norbert Young, GCMG, MBE (born 20 November 1932) is a Belizean politician who was the 2nd Governor General of Belize. He was appointed as Governor General in 1993 by Queen of the United Kingdom, Elizabeth II: she is also Queen of Belize because Belize is a commonwealth realm. In 2021, he retired as Governor General. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:Living people Category:Governors-general of Belize Category:University of the West Indies alumni
title: Colville Young
